# tags(_:)

**Type Method**

Construct a list of tags to apply to a test.

## Declaration

```swift
static func tags(_ tags: Tag...) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **tags**: The list of tags to apply to the test.

## Return Value

An instance of [doc://org.swift.testing/documentation/Testing/Tag/List] containing the specified tags.

## Categorizing tests and adding information

- **comments**: The user-provided comments for this trait.
